thread.title: Lake Superior Pizza partners with Honey Baked Bread Co., offers gluten-free crust
thread.title_full: Lake Superior Pizza partners with Honey Baked Bread Co., offers gluten-free crust

author: @wluctv6
title: Lake Superior Pizza partners with Honey Baked Bread Co., offers gluten-free crust
text:
Lake Superior Pizza partners with Honey Baked Bread Co., offers gluten-free crust
MARQUETTE, Mich. (WLUC) - Lake Superior Pizza Subs & Specialties now has a gluten-free crust option to choose from.
Lake Superior Pizza recently partnered with Honey Baked Bread Co., a bakery off Third Street in Marquette. The crust is gluten-free, dairy-free, egg-free, soy-free and vegan.
The Lake Superior Pizza owner Kristin Young says the bakery makes the dough in self-contained packaging. Young says Lake Superior Pizza has a small workspace, so they could never make their own gluten-free dough due to the flour in the air.
“I, myself, have food allergies, so it’s always been really important to know what’s in every single recipe,” Young said. “We can pull out a recipe book and know exactly what’s in everything and have a gluten-free option even though we have residual flour in the air, we’ve taken a lot of precautions to make sure that we have as minimal cross-contamination as possible.”
Young says it only comes in a 12-inch crust for now, but you can order it with any type of pizza you want.
